import React from "react"; import Link from "next/link"; const Post = props => { const { post } = props; return (

  • {post.nick}

    {post.created_at}
  • {post.name}

{post.title}

{post.content}

  • {post.begeni ? post.begeni : 0}
  • {post.toplam ? post.toplam : 0}
); }; export default Post;
